text: Stone Mountain is a city in DeKalb County, Georgia, in the United States. The population was 6,703 at the 2020 census. Stone Mountain is located in the eastern part of Dekalb County and is a suburb of the Atlanta, Georgia. It was host to some 1996 Olympic Games events and is home to Stone Mountain. ==References== Category:Cities in Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Stone Mountain, Georgia
